/wiki/Alireza_Samimi: Alireza Samimi ( Persian : علیرضا صمیمی , born 29 June 1987 in , Bushehr , Iran ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Goalkeeper , and currently a member of Mes Sungun and the Iran national futsal team .
/wiki/Taha_Mortazavi: Taha Mortazavi SorkhKolaei ( Persian : طه مرتضوی سرخکلائی , born 27 May 1988 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Left Winger , and currently a member of Shahrvand Sari .
/wiki/Vahid_Shafiei: Vahid Shafiei ( Persian : وحید شفیعی , born 28 September 1992 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Defender , and currently a member of Cosmo FC Jakarta and the Azerbaijan national futsal team .
/wiki/Mohammad_Keshavarz: Mohammad Keshavarz Nasrabadi ( Persian : محمد کشاورز نصرآبادی , born 5 July 1982 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Defender , and currently a member of Giti Pasand .
/wiki/Alireza_Vafaei: Alireza Vafaei ( Persian : علیرضا وفایی , born 6 January 1989 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Left Winger , and currently a member of Sohan Mohammad Sima in the Iranian Futsal Super League .
/wiki/Ali_Asghar_Hassanzadeh: Ali Asghar Hassanzadeh Navlighi ( Persian : علی‌اصغر حسن‌زاده ناولیقی , born 2 November 1987 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Pivot , and currently a member of Giti Pasand in the Iranian Futsal Super League and the Iran national futsal team . Hassanzadeh is regarded as one of the greatest Asian futsal players in history and has been named AFC Futsal Player of the Year four times ( 2014 , 2016 , 2017 , and 2018 ) and was a nominee for World Futsal Player of the Year in 2015 . He is also the all time top goalscorer of the AFC Futsal Club Championship with 33 goals . Hassanzadeh is sponsored by Spanish brand Joma .
/wiki/Ghodrat_Bahadori: Ghodrat Bahadori ( Persian : قدرت بهادری , born 30 January 1988 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Right Winger , and currently a member of Farsh Ara Mashhad and the Iran national futsal team .
/wiki/Hossein_Tayyebi: Hossein Tayyebi Bidgoli ( Persian : حسین طیبی بیدگلی , born 29 September 1988 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a member of Kairat Almaty and the Iran national futsal team , for which he played 130 matches and scored 150 goals . His first match with the national team was in 2009 at the age of 20 . He was ranked Top Goalscorer at the 2014 ( 15 ) and 2018 AFC Futsal Championship ( 14 ) , and 5th Best Player in the World at the UMBRO Futsal Awards in 2017 and 2018 . His current club , Kairat Almaty , came 2nd in the 2019 Futsal Champions League .
/wiki/Mohammad_Taheri: Mohammad Taheri ( Persian : محمد طاهری , born 5 February 1985 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Right Winger , and currently a player of Setaregan Varamin .
/wiki/Ali_Kiaei: Seyed Ali Kiaei ( Persian : سید علی کیایی , born 20 April 1987 ) is an Iranian futsal player .
/wiki/Sepehr_Mohammadi: Sepehr Mohammadi Kamalabadi ( Persian : سپهر محمدی کمال‌آبادی , born 8 August 1989 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a goalkeeper , and currently a member of Gazprom-Ugra Yugorsk and the Iran national futsal team .
/wiki/Farhad_Tavakkoli: Farhad Tavakoli Roozbahani ( Persian : فرهاد توکلی روزبهانی , born 13 January 1989 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Defender , and currently a player of Kuwait SC and Iran national futsal team .
/wiki/Mehdi_Javid: Mahdi Javid ( Persian : مهدی جاوید , born 3 May 1987 ) is an Iranian futsal player . He is a Pivot , and currently a member of Mes Sungun and the Iran national futsal team .
/wiki/Futsal_at_the_2013_Asian_Indoor_an: Futsal for the 2013 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games was held in two venues , at the Songdo Global Campus , and the Dongbu Students Gymnasium . Matches took place from 26 June to 6 July 2013 , with a break on 2 July .
/wiki/Kurash_at_the_2013_Asian_Indoor_an: Kurash for the 2013 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games was held at the Ansan Sangnoksu Gymnasium . It took place from 4 to 6 July 2013 . In the past , this sport was a demonstration one for Macau 2007 . Like the sport of indoor kabaddi , Kurash was contested in both Hanoi ( Asian Indoor Games ) and Bangkok ( Asian Martial Arts Games ) separately in 2009 for medals .
/wiki/Muay_Thai_at_the_2013_Asian_Indoor: Muay Thai at the 2013 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games was held at the Dowon Gymnasium . It took place from 29 June to 2 July 2013 .
/wiki/Cue_sports_at_the_2013_Asian_Indoo: Cue sports for the 2013 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games was held at the Songdo Convensia . It took place from 29 June to 6 July 2013 . This was the third time this sport was part of the Games , after Macau 2007 and Hanoi 2009 .
/wiki/Nasimeh_Gholami: Nasimeh Gholami ( Persian : نسيمه غلامى , born July 18 , 1985 in Tehran , Iran ) is an Iranian futsal player . She started playing futsal in 2001 . She is current captain of Iran women 's national futsal team since 2014 .
/wiki/Fereshteh_Karimi: Fereshteh Karimi is an Iranian women 's futsal player currently playing for Azad University in Iran . She was chosen as one of the top 10 nominees for the best woman player in the world in 2013 by the futsalplanet website . In September 2015 she won the first AFC Women 's Futsal Championship playing for Iran , and was chosen as the Most Valuable Player of the tournament . She is also participating at the second 2018 AFC Women 's Futsal Championship in Thailand .
/wiki/Niloufar_Ardalan: Niloufar Ardalan ( Persian : نیلوفر اردلان ; born 2 June 1985 ) is an Iranian football player currently playing for Zob Ahan Banovan . Ardalan plays as a left midfielder for the Iran women 's national football team . She is also captain of that team . In September 2015 , she missed the Asian Cup because her husband , Mehdi Toutounchi , a TV presenter , refused to let her travel . This is allowed under Islamic laws enforced in Iran . Later the same year her husband also refused her to go to the world championships in Guatemala . Ardalan went to court , and the judge allowed her to go to the world championships . In 2015 , she was listed as one of BBC 's 100 Women .
/wiki/Meraj_Sheikh: Meraj Sheykh ( born 26 May 1988 ) is an Iranian professional kabaddi player who currently plays for Dabang Delhi . He holds the first position for all-rounders in Pro Kabaddi Leagues all-time scoring charts . His signature move - the Scorpion Kick - further accentuates his sharp reflexes and flexibility . The move requires a raider to turn towards the mid-line and then snap his back knee up to pick up a touch on a defender on the way back , similar to the sting of a scorpion .
/wiki/Abolfazl_Maghsoudloo: Abolfazl Maghsoudlou ( born 7 August 1992 ) is an Iranian professional Kabaddi player . He is currently playing for U Mumba in Pro Kabaddi League Season 6 .
/wiki/Fazel_Atrachali: Fazel Atrachali ( born 29 March 1992 ) is an Iranian kabaddi player who currently represents U Mumba in the VIVO Pro Kabaddi League and the Iranian National kabaddi team . Atrachali is one of the most successful foreign players in the history of the VIVO Pro Kabaddi league and is currently the only foreign player to rank among the top 10 tackle points scorer in league history . In the 4th edition of the VIVO Pro Kabaddi league , he won the award of the Best Defender of the Season award . He is the highest-paid foreign player in the pro kabddi league
/wiki/Indoor_kabaddi_at_the_2013_Asian_I: Indoor Kabaddi for the 2013 Asian Indoor and Martial Arts Games was held at the Ansan Sangnoksu Gymnasium . It took place from 29 June to 3 July 2013 . Women 's indoor kabaddi teams made their debut in these Games , as only the men 's teams were allowed to compete for medals at both Macau 2007 and Hanoi 2009 previously .
/wiki/Masoud_Minaei: Masoud The Silent Assassin Minaei ( born 28 July 1992 ) is an Iranian kickboxer , fighting out of Sam & Rad gym . He has competed in the Glory , Kunlun Fight and King of Kings promotions . He is 2019 WKU European champion .
